description: A Kotlin class defining a Fragment in an Android application, specifically for a 'favorites' screen UI component.

classes.name: FavoritesFragment
classes.description: A Fragment subclass that displays a favorites screen with preset text views.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the layout for the fragment, creating its view hierarchy.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes the UI elements after the view has been created, setting text for specific TextViews.
